title: linz
author: linz
content: I try to study pos pow hybrid algorithm. I need github source .can someone show me.

comments.author: Rizzrack
comments.body: En example of a coin that is POW first X blocks and then forks to POW is Nevacoinhttps://github.com/Nevacoin/nevacoin/blob/e1e8c9ed98d0f89220059e02636dd049808e0dd6/src/chainparams.cpp#L59Dash is indeed the biggest from the PoW & PoS family but is also a privacy coin so "a bit more complex" than an average JoeCoin, but a great example nevertheless

comments.author: VRExpress
comments.body: Then you need to look into XEC (Ecash), this is one of the best for me and when it comes to BTC price this coin is very friendly, I've been holding and mining for a while now, you can check the coinmarketcap link here and also do your own research.https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/ecash/
